post.title: Who we are and what we do
post.body:
We have over twenty years experience in business development in China. We have extensive experience in education, e-commerce, retail, real estate, and new business development. We have successfully started and run three of our own businesses in retail chain stores, education training, and internet companies. We have worked closely with many other small overseas businesses to open their China office and sell their products in China. 

In this particular business segment, we do nothing else but one: naming your business properly in Chinese. Your business name can indeed make a difference. Sometimes it may cost you a fortune, or directly influence the fate of your business in China. 

Please see the following link for some classical tales. They are true.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/14qBuhh5LCSe9CQ6uTwBmpmeGAe93Ut6ci/?Post:17:Naming+in+Chinese+is+a+big+thing
